H0.text: Mechanical is the type of energy transferred from one object to another by simple machines.

H1.text: Chemical energy is transferred from one object to another by simple machines.

H2.text: Nuclear is the type of energy that is transferred from one object to another by simple machines.

H3.text: Electrical energy is the type of energy transferred from one object to another by simple machines.

A4.text: A turbine converts the kinetic energy of a stream of gas or liquid into mechanical energy.

A5.text: Chemical energy is the kind of potential energy 'stored' in chemical bonds and is studied in chemistry.
